doc.field: Cass Gilbert papers and architectural drawings
Cass Gilbert papers and architectural drawings

This subseries contains the box and foldered material regarding Cass Gilbert projects. The material has been filed alphabetically by project and then by the project number assigned by Gilbert's office. Gilbert also designated material within the project files by type. Thus, the project files are also divided by type of material. The types of material include Preliminary Correspondence, Correspondence, Memoranda/Notes, Specifications, Bid Documents, Proposals, Reports, Contracts/Agreements, Financial Statements (includes Requisitions), Change Orders, Drawings, Photographs, etc.
Cass Gilbert papers and architectural drawings
